about.intro1: I am a 23 year old guy from Inderøy, Norway with a bachelor in digital media & design. This site is meant as a portefolio aswell as a place I can experiment with development and design.
about.intro2: My goal is to get better at front-end development and I have this autumn worked at Prios Kompetanse AS , where i have gotten to know VueJS.
about.bachelorDescription: A bachelor in digitale media and design at HIØ involves an introduction to many of the steps included in development and design of digital applications. Some of the courses I have been trough are web-development, programming, 3D-modelling and graphical design.
about.wordpressDescription:
Until recently I have used Wordpress to publish projects from my course, they are still here:
https://erlendworkblog.wordpress.com
about.erlendwebDescription:
Erlendweb is made with VueJS and hosted on Netlify. The source code for this page is public at:
https://github.com/bronsetn/erlendweb

contact.description: Messages from here are sent to bronsetherlend@gmail.com

projects.title: Maribro.no
projects.description: Website made to show of the art made by Mari Brønseth. The site is made with VueJs and hosted on Netlify. The site consist of a page to present the artist aswell as a image-gallery for many of the artworks she's made.
projects.content: One of the challenges with the development of the site was to find a good solution for presenting the different versions of each design. In the beginning the gallery consisted of all the images in the database listed one after the other. But I decided to to change it so that each design has it's own cluster, consisting of all of it's versions.

projects.title: Prios Events
projects.description: Website meant for job fairs and similar types of events. I worked with the development of the front-end and design of the site for Prios Kompetanse AS. The site is one of my first projects working with VueJS and is still being devolped further at Prios.
projects.content: Through this project I got to work with implimenting one of Prios's systems in to a new website, I also got some insight into the tools and methods used in modern web development. Experience I have made us of when developing erlendweb.

projects.title: Wordpress website
projects.description: Website used for publishing some of the projects from my bachelor study. The process of setting up the websiteis relativly easy as you can simply use Wordpresses UX, at the same time it's also a lot less exiting as there are many restrictions with using a CMS.
projects.content: I have tried to carry over many of the design choises and elements from the Wordpress-site to erlendweb.no. Some of the similarities between the site's is the color palette used and some of the graphic elements used such as the logo.

other.description: Smaller experiments with code and design.
other.nasaDescription: Here i have used one of Nasa's public API's that gives out a new space-related image each day.
other.nasaSources:
For a list of all images published since 2015 visit: https://apod.nasa.gov/apod/archivepix.html
For information about using the API i have used this tutorial: https://blog.jakelee.co.uk/an-introduction-to-the-nasa-apod-api/
other.forecastDescription: This component uses the browsers geolocation to get a forecast for your coordinates. If geolocation is disabled a forecast from Oslo is fetched instead.
other.forecastSources:
To get watherdata Openweathermap's 5 day forecast API is used: https://openweathermap.org/api
To get the city or place name Openstreetmap's API is used: https://www.openstreetmap.org/
